name: Bouncing Demons
description:
PLAY IT ON FULLSCREEN

Once opon a time there were a king and a queen, and they were quite evil.

Someday, someone conspired against they (someone we don't know), and hired some assassins to kill them (Also we don't know who were the assassin, I'm so sorry).

They died and go to hell - because they were evil.

There, they were transform in a card game King and Queen,  and they have to battle against each other sending their poor fellas demon knights (or throw some giant cards) to win the title of:

THE KING/QUEEN OF BOUNCING!
